245.b: case studies of successful technology transfer

505.a: Accelerating the Diffusion of Climate-Friendly Technology -- Building Skills, Sharing Information and Assessing Technology Needs -- Global Competitiveness through Technology Upgrades: The Ecofrig Hydrocarbon Refrigerator in India -- An Exercise in Capacity Building: Energy Efficiency Centres in the Transition Economies -- Spreading the Word: Dissemination of Photovoltaic Systems in Kenya -- Effective Teamwork: Technology Co-operation in the Philippines -- Testing Solar Stoves in South Africa -- Engaging the Private Sector -- Government Policies and Private Finance Work Together: India Renewable Resources Development Project -- Policy Reform in El Salvador Stimulates Renewable Energy Development -- Leverage the Market: The Prodeem Programme in Brazil -- Favourable Framework Attracts Large-scale Green Investment: Harnessing the Wind in Honduras -- Improving International Co-ordination and Development Aid -- Affordable Efficiency: Demand-Side Management in the Ukraine -- Networking is a Key Element: The EC-ASEAN COGEN Programme -- Financing Climate-Friendly Projects -- Getting Subsidies Right: Poland's Efficient Lighting Project -- Dismantling Financial Barriers: Hungary's Energy Efficiency Co-Financing Fund -- Working Together to Lower Costs: Environmentally Adapted Energy Systems in the Baltic Sea Region -- "Summary for Policymakers: Methodological and Technological Issues in Technology Transfer", Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change, 2000

520.a: Technology Without Borders presents case studies of successful transfer of climate-friendly technology and practices. It explores the causes for success and draws the lessons learned. Key messages are presented for the fight against climate destabilisation. The terms "climate-friendly technology" and "climate technology" used here refer to technologies, practices or techniques, which reduce greenhouse-gas emissions or assist countries in adapting to climate change.

710.a: Organização de Cooperação e Desenvolvimento Econômico
